attributes.review: Would not wish this app upon anyone. Hard to navigate and completely biased. Finally, you should not need an account to use it. They will bombard you with their “information” DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app took over an hour to download and I proceeded to see Trump himself banging on my window like a woodpecker, he’s gone now but the app is very laggy and crashed multiple times.
attributes.title: Black lives matter

attributes.review: it was disgusting it stink this app is horrible for people of all ages nobody should have to go through that or see the rude and offensive content!!! This app should not be available to use I am so disappointed.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: The app crashed as soon as I opened it. I was confused and tried once more, but to no avail. This app is faulty! Maybe it’s too many users at once or something....
attributes.title: Kept crashing

attributes.review: This app LITERALLY took 3 hours to download and for some reason wouldn’t let me leave the home page until it was completely downloaded. Once I opened the app it drained ALL my battery so like I said WORST APP EVER! do not recommend at all😌
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Somehow the app gave all of my security info and sent it straight to the government, then all my information was publicallu displayed. Do not download, you will need to buy a second devise if you do.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: The app itself takes too long to install and has proven to be very useless and makes my phone screen look very disorganized and not color coordinated.
attributes.title: Terrible App!!

attributes.review: The  App is horrible it glitched my phone and hacked it why do you have to have an app why does the president have to have an app that’s my question but whatever it’s horrible. I said what I said .✨
attributes.title: This app is horrible ✨💅🏽

attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER INVENTED MARK MY WORDS!!!!! this app has torn apart my family.😾😾 ive had to sell my own father to the chinese government. this had been the single most TRAGIC occurrence IN MY LIFE EVER! I HATE THIS PLACE! china has ruined the world. tell them to take their VIRUSES back.🙄🙄

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my son to play but he was crying and yelling the whole time because the picture of trumps nudes just appeared onto the app and he was scared and yelling “mommy, where’s his pp?” This is so unprofessional deleting this app off my sons ipad
